tswitem.name: Grievous Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Grievous Augment Resonator
An unattuned damage augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase the damage dealt by this ability by 5%/ 7%/ 9%/ 12,5%/ 15%.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 4 Attuned Accurate Augment Resonators
  • 60 Pure metal
  • 60 Pure fire
